data.caption:
Outcome Of Board Meeting Un-Audited Financial Results
(Standalone And Consolidated), For The Quarter And Nine Months Ended December 31, 2023 Of The Company.
data.news_body:
We wish to inform that the Board of Directors of PNB Housing Finance Limited at its Meeting held on January 24, 2024 approved the Un - Audited Financial Results for the quarter and nine months ended December 31, 2023.

The Board of Directors has also approved the appointment of Ms. Veena G Kamath as the Company Secretary and KMP w.e.f. February 01, 2024.

data.caption: Audio Recording Of Earnings Conference Call Held On January 24, 2023.
data.news_body: As per Regulation 30 of the SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015, please refer below Audio Recording of the conference call held on January 24, 2023 for Un- Audited Standalone and Consolidated Financial Results of the Company for the Quarter and Nine Months ended December 31, 2022.https://www.pnbhousing.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/01/PHF0220230124145214.mp3The above information will also be made available on the website of the Company.

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Investor Presentation
data.news_body: Pursuant to Regulation 30 of the SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015, as amended, please find attached herewith the Investor Presentation of the Company for the Quarter and Nine Months ended December 31, 2022.

data.caption: Board Meeting Outcome for Outcome Of Board Meeting
data.news_body:
Pursuant to Regulation 30, 33 and 52 of the SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015, as amended ('Listing Regulations'), we wish to inform you that the Board of Directors of PNB Housing Finance Limited ('the Company') at its meeting held today i.e. January 24, 2023 which commenced at 12:30 P.M (IST) and concluded at 02:40 P.M. (IST) has inter-alia:

1. Approved the Un-Audited Standalone and Consolidated Financial Results for the quarter and nine months ended December 31, 2022.
2. Approved the issuance of Non - Convertible Debentures aggregating up to INR 2,000 Crores (Rupees Two Thousand Crore Only) on Private Placement Basis in one or more tranches.

data.caption: Board Meeting Outcome for PNB Housing Finance Limited  Has Informed The Exchange About Board Meeting Held On 28-Apr-2022 For Approval Of Financial Statements (Consolidated And Standalone) For The Quarter And Financial Year Ended March 31, 2022.
data.news_body:
We wish to inform you that the Board of Directors of the Company at its meeting held today which commenced at 12.15 p.m. and concluded at 5:30 p.m., inter alia approved the Audited Standalone and Consolidated Financial Results of the Company for the quarter and financial year ended March 31, 2022, in terms of Regulation 33 and 52 of the SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015 (Listing Regulations).

A copy of the said results along with the Report issued by the Joint Statutory Auditors of the Company with unmodified opinion are enclosed herewith and the same are being uploaded on the website of the Company i.e. www.pnbhousing.com.


Please note that in terms of the Insider Trading Policy of the PNB Housing Finance Limited and the SEBI (Prohibition of Insider Trading) Regulations, 2015, the window for dealing in the shares of the Company will open from Monday, May 01, 2022. You are requested to take note of the above.
